TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit BuildEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks The BuildEventArgs class is an abstract base class for all <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework> event argument classes.
## Examples The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events.
[!code-cs[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/msbuild_BasicLogger/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs> constructor takes no parameters, and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> and the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A> property to the current thread.

MemberSignature.Value: protected BuildEventArgs (string message, string helpKeyword, string senderName);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, string helpKeyword, string senderName) cil managed

Docs.param: The Help keyword associated with the event.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName%2A> values.

MemberSignature.Value: protected BuildEventArgs (string message, string helpKeyword, string senderName, DateTime eventTimestamp);

Docs.param: The Help keyword associated with the event.
The date and time to associate with the event.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets location contextual information. This is attached to logging events to define where they are located in relation to the process, engine, project, target, or task that is executing.
Docs.value: A object representing the location contextual information.

Docs.summary: Gets the Help keyword for the event.
Docs.value: The Help keyword for the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Message { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets the message for the event.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the <xref:System.Object> raising the event.
Docs.value: The name of the <xref:System.Object> raising the event.

Docs.summary: Gets an integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
Docs.value: An integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.

Docs.summary: Gets the time the event was raised as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
Docs.value: The time the event was raised as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
